verses.roman:
kṛṣṇa yadi rukmiṇīre kailā parihāsa
'kṛṣṇa chāḍibena'--jāni' rukmiṇīra haila trāsa

synonyms: kṛṣṇa—Lord Kṛṣṇa; yadi—although; rukmiṇīre—unto Rukmiṇī, the first queen; kailā—did; parihāsa—joking; kṛṣṇa—Lord Kṛṣṇa; chāḍibena—will give me up; jāni'-thinking; rukmiṇīra—of Rukmiṇī; haila—there was; trāsa—shock.
translation: "Although Kṛṣṇa was joking with Queen Rukmiṇī, she was thinking that He was going to give up her company, and she was therefore shocked.
